scripts.deploy:root: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),p='.gh-root'; if(fs.existsSync(p)) fs.rmSync(p,{recursive:true,force:true}); fs.mkdirSync(p); fs.copyFileSync('index.html', p+'/index.html');" && gh-pages -d .gh-root -b gh-pages -m 'deploy root index'
scripts.deploy:main: npm run build:main && gh-pages -d dist-main -b gh-pages --dest main --add -m 'deploy main'
scripts.deploy:way: npm run build:way  && gh-pages -d dist-way  -b gh-pages --dest way-submenu --add -m 'deploy way'
